analyzed: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // 'dod pa chen po rnam dag phyir //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' grub pa ni //

original: rtag par myur du bshad par bya //
analyzed: rtag par myur du bshad par bya //

original: ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
analyzed: ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //

analyzed: de srid sems can gdon par bya //

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje grub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad @144b rab tu ster ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' yin la /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa ras ris la bri bar bya'o //

original: bzhad pa dang / bcas pa dngos po thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba 'o //
analyzed: bzhad pa dang / bcas pa dngos po thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba 'o //
translated: Laughing, he should be painted with all the things, surrounded by the tathāgatas.

original: de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas rdo rje'i tshig gis stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya 'o //
analyzed: de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas rdo rje'i tshig gis stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya 'o //
translated: In front of him, with the mudrā-fist of all the tathāgatas, one should recite the vajra words one hundred thousand times.

original: 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan phyed na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan phyed na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro //

original: de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pas bcom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pas bcom par bya'o //

original: de nas tho rangs kyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas tho rangs kyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, at dawn, one will attain the state of all the tathāgatas and the state of the bodhisattvas.

original: gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod na /
translated: If one desires the state of Mahāvajradhara,

original: des lugs ma 'am /
analyzed: des lugs ma 'am /

original: 'dus byas pa 'am /
analyzed: 'dus byas pa 'am /

original: 'dus byas pa 'am /
analyzed: 'dus byas pa 'am /

original: ras ris la sogs par legs par bris pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du sngar sgrub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par ci ltar thob pa ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgrub pa bshad do //

translated: One should practice the rite of Vajrasattva just as one has obtained the special image.

original: zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub chen po 'grub po //🔽gal te rdo rje @145a *//
analyzed: zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub chen po 'grub po // gal te rdo rje @145a *//

analyzed: 'chang chen po dgug na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyus dgug cing ci 'dod pa bsgrub par bya 'o //
translated: If one wishes to summon Mahāvajradhara, one should summon him with the great hook of great bliss and make him accomplish whatever one desires.

original: zla ba gcig bzlas nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gcig bzlas nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o //
translated: Having recited for one month, one should request everything.

original: gal te rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsgrub na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms pas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes bsgroms la bsgrub par bya'o //

translated: If one wishes to accomplish oneself with one’s own seal, one should bind the great seal of one’s deity, meditate on oneself as Vajrasattva, and practice.

original: de ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o //

original: yang dang / yang du sgom zhing bzlas pa de srid bdag gis bya 'o //
analyzed: yang dang / yang du sgom zhing bzlas pa de srid bdag gis bya 'o //
translated: I will do this meditation and recitation again and again.

original: ci srid rdo rje 'chang nyid zla ba phyed bzlas nas thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci srid rdo rje 'chang nyid zla ba phyed bzlas nas thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as I attain the state of Vajradhara by reciting the half-moon mantra.

original: de nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du rang yid du 'ong ba dang bcas par rab tu zhugs te phyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par bya'o //

translated: Then, if one wishes to accomplish the state of lord of all powers, one should enter into union with a beautiful woman, form the mudra, and recite the mantra as long as one wishes.

original: ci srid bdag 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug dang / khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci srid bdag 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug dang / khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as I become the lord of all powers and the master of the entire three realms.

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i rdo rje'i rgyun gyi rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rol par mdzad nas ma bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgya'i las kyi rgyun rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs
translated: Then, the Blessed One Vajradhara, having manifested the wisdom of the nature of accomplishment of the entire three realms, the nature of the vajra continuum, taught this extensive vajra ritual of the mudra action without accomplishment:

original: so // ma bsgrubs pa'i snying po'i las rnams 'di lta ste /
analyzed: so // ma bsgrubs pa'i snying po'i las rnams 'di lta ste /

analyzed: bdag nyid bsrung @145b ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis so //

analyzed: thams cad bsrung pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang pa'i mdzod spus so //

analyzed: phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas so //
translated: Binding all directions, sub-directions, and the maṇḍala is with the great-bliss-vajra-secret-blazing garland.

analyzed: bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba mi bskyod pas so //
translated: Conquering the power of all māras is with the great-bliss-vajra-secret-akṣobhya.

original: tshe 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdud rtsis so //
analyzed: tshe 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdud rtsis so //

analyzed: gzugs chen po phun sum tshogs pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gzugs can gyis so //

analyzed: gzi brjid dang / na tshod shin tu bzang po rab tu 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bcud kyis len gyis so //

analyzed: stobs dang / mdog 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mthu yis so //

analyzed: dbang bskur ba thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i cod pan gyis so //
translated: For all consecrations, [use] the secret vajra crown.

analyzed: nor thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug gis so //

analyzed: rgyal srid thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: For attaining a kingdom, [use] the seal of the secret vajra king.

analyzed: sa ma lus pa thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rtsal gyis so //
translated: For attaining all stages, [use] the secret vajra power.

original: thams cad dbab pa dang / g-yo bar bya ba dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dus gsum bden pa nyid du smrar gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug pas so //
analyzed: thams cad dbab pa dang / g-yo bar bya ba dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dus gsum bden pa nyid du smrar gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug pas so //
translated: For causing all to fall, to tremble, to dance, and to speak the truth of the three times, [use] the great bliss secret vajra pledge.

original: pra se na thams cad grub pa @146a *//
analyzed: pra se na thams cad grub pa @146a *//
translated: For the accomplishment of all activities,

original: la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pra se na dbab pas so //
analyzed: la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pra se na dbab pas so //
translated: by the descent of the secret vajra bliss.🔽For the liberation from all evil spirits,

original: gdon thams cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gdon las thar bas so //
analyzed: gdon thams cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gdon las thar bas so //
translated: by the liberation from the secret vajra evil spirits.🔽For the destruction of all poisons,

original: gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bgegs 'joms pas so //
analyzed: gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bgegs 'joms pas so //
translated: by the vajra secret destruction of obstacles.🔽For the paralysis of all,

analyzed: thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rengs pas so //
translated: by the vajra secret paralysis.🔽For the sleep of all,

original: thams cad gnyid log par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnyid kyis so //
analyzed: thams cad gnyid log par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnyid kyis so //
translated: by the vajra secret sleep.🔽For the sealing of all,

original: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro mas so //
analyzed: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro mas so //
translated: by the dakinis of the great bliss vajra secret commitment.🔽For the secrecy of all,

original: thams cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba mthar byed kyis so //
analyzed: thams cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba mthar byed kyis so //
translated: by the vajra secret destroyer.🔽For the overthrow of all,

original: thams cad bsgyel ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i h'um mdzad kyis so //
analyzed: thams cad bsgyel ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i h'um mdzad kyis so //
translated: by the vajra secret humkara.🔽For the raising of all,

original: thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis bslang ba 'o //
analyzed: thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis bslang ba 'o //
translated: by the vajra secret commitment raising.

original: thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bcings pas so //
analyzed: thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bcings pas so //
translated: For binding all, with the secret vajra binding.

original: thams cad thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge mus so //
analyzed: thams cad thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge mus so //
translated: For liberating all, with the secret vajra syllable mu.

original: phra men ma thams cad las thar bar bya ba la dang / sngon gyi gnas skabs rjes su sbyin pa la ni gsang ba chen po he ru ka'i rdo rjes so //
analyzed: phra men ma thams cad las thar bar bya ba la dang / sngon gyi gnas skabs rjes su sbyin pa la ni gsang ba chen po he ru ka'i rdo rjes so //
translated: For liberating from all yakṣiṇīs and bestowing past circumstances, with the great secret Heruka vajra.

analyzed: ma mo'i gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i drag mos so //
translated: For liberating from all mātṛkā grahas, with the secret vajra of Caṇḍī.

original: phra men ma thams cad kyis rgyas btab pa la dang / thar bar bya ba la dang / snying zos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar @146b 'jug pa dang / shi ba gso ba la ni dam tshig chen po gsang ba'i he ru ka'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: phra men ma thams cad kyis rgyas btab pa la dang / thar bar bya ba la dang / snying zos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar @146b 'jug pa dang / shi ba gso ba la ni dam tshig chen po gsang ba'i he ru ka'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: For sealing all yakṣiṇīs, liberating them, and causing another heart to appear from the eaten heart, and reviving the dead, with the empowerment mudrā of the great secret Heruka vajra pledge.

original: gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rjes so //
analyzed: gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rjes so //
translated: For destroying the mudrās of all evildoers, with the secret vajra vajra.

original: rims thams cad rab tu zhi ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so //
analyzed: rims thams cad rab tu zhi ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so //
translated: For pacifying all fevers, (use) the view of the blazing secret vajra.

original: dug thams cad gzhig pa dang / bza' ba dang / 'bab pa dang / 'chi ba gso ba la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: dug thams cad gzhig pa dang / bza' ba dang / 'bab pa dang / 'chi ba gso ba la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: For destroying all poisons, and for curing eating, falling, and death poisons, (use) the great secret vajra gem seal.

original: dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dug med pas so //
analyzed: dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dug med pas so //
translated: For pacifying all poisons and all compounded poisons, (use) the secret vajra nonpoison.

analyzed: sprin bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin chen pos so //

analyzed: sa ma lus pa g-yo zhing 'gul bar bya ba la ni @147b rdo rje gsang ba'i thar pas so //

analyzed: rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje rlung thams cad kyis so //

analyzed: gzhan yang cung zad 'byung ba yin na de grub pa dang / dngos grub dang / cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin du 'o //
translated: Moreover, if there is a little success, then it is accomplished, and there is also success and extensive rites in the same way.

original: gal te ma grub na lan gcig bzla 'o //
analyzed: gal te ma grub na lan gcig bzla 'o //
translated: If there is no success, then it is repeated once.

original: khams gsum pa ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: khams gsum pa ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so //
translated: For the sake of conquering all of the three realms, it is with the gesture of Vajra Humkara.

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang bas so //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang bas so //
translated: For the sake of subduing all of the realms of sentient beings, it is with the secret of Vajra Wrath.

original: 'jig rten gsum po las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal @152b ba'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal @152b ba'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: For the sake of conquering the three worlds, it is with the gesture of Trilokavijaya.

original: thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bsgyel ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bos so //
analyzed: thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bsgyel ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bos so //
translated: For the sake of summoning, entering, descending, binding, magnetizing, destroying, paralyzing, causing sleep, sealing, overturning, and killing everything, it is with the great bliss of Vajra Wrath.

original: thams cad ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje phra mo'i khro bos so //
analyzed: thams cad ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje phra mo'i khro bos so //
translated: For all the purposes of bringing down, one should use the wrathful one of the subtle vajra.

original: thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khro bos so //🔽thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje gad rgyangs kyis so //
analyzed: thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khro bos so // thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje gad rgyangs kyis so //
translated: For all the purposes of bringing down, one should use the wrathful one of the vajra descent.🔽For all the purposes of definitely subduing, one should use the vajra laughter.

original: las thams cad la nye bar dgod pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bos so //🔽bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba las /
analyzed: las thams cad la nye bar dgod pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bos so // bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba las /
translated: For all the purposes of establishing, one should use the wrathful one of the great bliss vajra pledge.🔽This is the extensive ritual of the pledge of the vajra secret of great bliss,

original: rab tu dga' ba las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
translated: arisen from the highest joy, the vajra secret totally victorious.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Tathagata, entered the concentration of the vajra wisdom seal of all tathagatas, called the unobstructed, pure Dharma of all the Tathagatas, which is not obstructed.

original: zhugs nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: zhugs nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
translated: Having entered, he supplicated his own Vajrasattva.🔽For the sake of the accomplishment of the great truth

original: bden pa chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: bden pa chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir //
translated: and the purification of great passion,

original: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
analyzed: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
translated: in the great pure lotus family,

original: mchog chen khyod kyis bskyed par mdzod //🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams @153a *//
analyzed: mchog chen khyod kyis bskyed par mdzod // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams @153a *//
translated: you should generate the great supreme one.

original: cad la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i padma zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: cad la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i padma zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Great Vajradhara, having made the manifestation called Vajra Vision of All Phenomena, spoke this mantra called the Vajra Lotus of the Great Bliss Secret:

original: aom hr'i bam ho:/
analyzed: aom hr'i bam ho:/
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas padma'i mdog gi mdangs can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu padma'i 'dab ma la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa /
analyzed: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas padma'i mdog gi mdangs can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu padma'i 'dab ma la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa /
translated: As soon as this was spoken, from the Blessed One's mouth, which had the luster of a lotus color, like the light of a moon mandala, there appeared a lotus petal-holding goddess,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / ral pa'i cod pan dang / na bza' dmar po 'chang ba dang / padma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / ral pa'i cod pan dang / na bza' dmar po 'chang ba dang / padma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
translated: The Tathagata bestows empowerment, the diadem of hair, the red robe, and the great lotus heroes, and they abide in the manner of the great mandala.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas g-yas pas rdo rje g-yon pas padma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas g-yas pas rdo rje g-yon pas padma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed One, with a very smiling face, holding a vajra in the right hand and a lotus in the left hand, and likewise with vajra pride, abides in vajra posture.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor ni /
translated: Then, the mandala:

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: In the manner of the great mandala,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo //
translated: all mandalas are marked with lines.

original: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag /
analyzed: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag /
translated: Place Vajra Lokeshvara,

original: padma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs rnams bri //
analyzed: padma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs rnams bri //
translated: and draw the assembly of lotus signs.

original: de na rdo rje padmas zhugs la mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: de na rdo rje padmas zhugs la mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug par bya'o //
translated: There, having entered with the vajra lotus, one should summon with the two hook fingers.

original: aom hr'i bam ho:/
analyzed: aom hr'i bam ho:/
translated: Om hrīṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: aom hr'i: mah'a su kha badzra a'a lo ke shva r'a ya me /
analyzed: aom hr'i: mah'a su kha badzra a'a lo ke shva r'a ya me /
translated: Om hrīḥ mahāsukha vajrālōkēśvarāya me.

original: a'a a'a he pra be sha dhi dhi me bha ba siddhi mmer mu dr'a p'a dee: dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: a'a a'a he pra be sha dhi dhi me bha ba siddhi mmer mu dr'a p'a dee: dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: A ā he praveśa dhi dhi me bhava siddhi mamme mudrā padair jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras @153b gzigs dbang phyug byon te mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras @153b gzigs dbang phyug byon te mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then the Blessed One Avalokiteśvara will arrive and grant all the supreme [achievements].

original: snang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The signs of appearance will arise.

original: cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang / sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang / sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
translated: All the extensive rituals, all the accomplishments and attainments are also like that.

original: ma bsgrubs kyang lan gcig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do //
analyzed: ma bsgrubs kyang lan gcig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do //
translated: Even without accomplishment, by reciting [the mantra] once, all activities are performed.

original: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba la ni padma chen pos so //🔽thams cad bsrung ba la ni padma'i gtsug tor gyis so //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba la ni padma chen pos so // thams cad bsrung ba la ni padma'i gtsug tor gyis so //
translated: For purifying all obscurations, [use] the great lotus.🔽For protecting all, [use] the lotus uṣṇīṣa.

original: thams cad rjes su chags pa la ni padma la lta bas so //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su chags pa la ni padma la lta bas so //
translated: For enthralling all, [use] the lotus gaze.

original: thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni padma kha 'byed pas so //
analyzed: thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni padma kha 'byed pas so //
translated: For attaining the samādhi of purifying all, [use] the lotus opening.

original: bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni padma chen po'i 'dod chags kyis so //
analyzed: bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni padma chen po'i 'dod chags kyis so //
translated: For controlling all women, [use] the great lotus passion.

original: skyes pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni padma chen po'i dbang phyug gis so //
analyzed: skyes pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni padma chen po'i dbang phyug gis so //
translated: For the subjugation of all men, with the great lotus lord.

original: rmi lam gdab pa la ni padma chen po dmar pos so //
analyzed: rmi lam gdab pa la ni padma chen po dmar pos so //
translated: For the casting of dreams, with the great red lotus.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i padma rmongs pa med pas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i padma rmongs pa med pas so //
translated: For the attainment of the supreme of the Blessed Ones, with the vajra secret lotus, which is not deluded.

original: bde ba chen po padma gsang ba las /
analyzed: bde ba chen po padma gsang ba las /
translated: From the secret lotus of great bliss,

original: bde ba chen po padma'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa 'o ////🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge @154a *//
analyzed: bde ba chen po padma'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa 'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge @154a *//
translated: the extensive ritual of the lotus family of great bliss.

original: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Lord of the Three Worlds, the Tathagata, entered the samadhi called the Mudra of the Consecration of the Jewel that Fulfills All Wishes, and made a request to his own Vajrasattva:

original: bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing great bliss, and purifying great passion,

original: nor bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni //
analyzed: nor bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni //
translated: the supreme jewel family,

original: mgrin 'byor phyir ni skyed par mdzod //
analyzed: mgrin 'byor phyir ni skyed par mdzod //
translated: In order to generate the wealth of the throat,🔽Then the Blessed One, having performed the consecration of all the Tathagatas called the “Vow of the Great Bliss Vajra Jewel,”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags 'di gsungs so //
translated: he spoke this mantra:

original: aom li ti dha bhanta ta te tr'am/
analyzed: aom li ti dha bhanta ta te tr'am/
translated: Om lity dhabhanta te tam.

original: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po che rab tu phyung nas phyag g-yon pa la rab tu gnas so //
analyzed: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po che rab tu phyung nas phyag g-yon pa la rab tu gnas so //
translated: Then, as soon as he spoke this, the Blessed One, from the Great Bliss Vajra Consecration, brought forth the jewel and it rested in his left hand.

original: nor bu rin po che dag pa de yang mrgad rnyog pa med pa'i mdog can rdo rje rin po che rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba can nor bu rin po che'i mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yongs su bsnams pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che dag pa de yang mrgad rnyog pa med pa'i mdog can rdo rje rin po che rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba can nor bu rin po che'i mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yongs su bsnams pa /
translated: That pure jewel was the color of a stainless emerald, consecrated by the light rays of the Vajra Jewel, and it was marked with a jewel bow and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs so //
translated: He enters the mandala of the Blessed One in the manner of the great maṇḍala.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni //
translated: Then, the drawing of the maṇḍala:

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bya //
translated: All maṇḍalas are to be laid out with lines.

original: rdo rje rin chen bdag po bzhag /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen bdag po bzhag /
translated: The lord of the vajra jewel is placed.

original: nor bu'i rigs @154b ni chen po bri //
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs @154b ni chen po bri //
translated: The great maṇḍala of the jewel family is drawn.

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya zhugs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya zhugs te /
translated: Having entered with the mudrā of the vajra jewel,

original: de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya 'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya 'o //
translated: in the same way, one should summon with the vajra hook of the two index fingers.

original: aom mah'a su kha badzra bi bh'u te ra ya bha ga b'an tam a'a karsha ya gi ra bam sarba ta th'a ga ta aa gram sam tra sa ma be na n'a ma bhe ra ma tra be /
analyzed: aom mah'a su kha badzra bi bh'u te ra ya bha ga b'an tam a'a karsha ya gi ra bam sarba ta th'a ga ta aa gram sam tra sa ma be na n'a ma bhe ra ma tra be /
translated: Oṃ mahāsukha vajra vibhūtaraya bhagavan tam ākarṣaya girvaṃ sarvatathāgata agrā samavena nāma bheramatra

original: tram ba da da sv'ah'a /
analyzed: tram ba da da sv'ah'a /
translated: traṃ badha svāhā.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu thams cad dang bcas pa byon pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu thams cad dang bcas pa byon pa yin no //
translated: Then the Blessed One Akṣobhya, together with all the jewels, arrives.

original: spyi bo nas spu ldang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi bo nas spu ldang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sign of the hairs on the head standing on end will occur.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya 'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya 'o //
translated: One should understand that the consecration of oneself by the Blessed One is with the great vajra consecration.

original: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: Then one should admit the disciples, and one should perform all the extensive rites as before.

original: de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //🔽dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus so //
analyzed: de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro // dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus so //
translated: Then, the rites that have not been accomplished are accomplished by one recitation.🔽For the attainment of all consecrations, it is with the vajra jewel sprout.

original: don thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rtse mos so //
analyzed: don thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rtse mos so //
translated: For the attainment of all aims, it is with the top of the banner of the vajra jewel.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas so //🔽gter chen po thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen gyis 'og gi phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas so // gter chen po thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen gyis 'og gi phyag rgyas so //
translated: For the fulfillment of all wishes, it is with the seal of the great vajra jewel.🔽For the attainment of the great treasure, it is with the lower seal of the vajra jewel.

original: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen chen po'i sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen chen po'i sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so //
translated: For the attainment of the seal of the vajra consecration, it is with the lower seal of the great vajra jewel.

original: rdo @155a *// rje'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas so //
analyzed: rdo @155a *// rje'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas so //
translated: For one who has received the empowerment of the great vajra, with a garland of great vajras.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che chen po'i phreng bas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che chen po'i phreng bas so //
translated: For one who has received the empowerment of the great bodhisattva, with a garland of great vajra jewels.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dam pa'i phreng bas so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dam pa'i phreng bas so //
translated: For one who has received the empowerment of the tathāgatas, with a garland of the sublime empowerment of the vajra jewel.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyi phreng bas so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyi phreng bas so //
translated: For one who has received the empowerment of the great vajra holder, with a garland of the crest jewel of the supreme body of all the tathāgatas.

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba las /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba las /
translated: From the Vajra-Secret of Great Bliss:

original: bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
analyzed: bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////

analyzed: rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang zhing mthe bong mnyam po la mdzub mo bkug pa bzhag ste dpral ba'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag na dbang bskur ba thams cad gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the supplication for all consecrations.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no //
translated: This is also the binding of all mudrās, such as the great mudrā, and so forth.

original: dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam por nor bu mthe bong rdo rjes bkag pa rdo rje nor bu'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam por nor bu mthe bong rdo rjes bkag pa rdo rje nor bu'o //
translated: The samaya-vajra-binding finger-tips are bent in, the fingers are even, and the jewel is blocked by the vajra thumb: this is the vajra jewel.

original: gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro //
translated: The others are the vajra-ratna fists arising from that.

original: de gnyis su byas nas rin bo che'i khu tshur ro //
analyzed: de gnyis su byas nas rin bo che'i khu tshur ro //
translated: Having made those two, they are the jewel fists.

original: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsgreng ba bsgrub par bya ba'i myu gu'o //
analyzed: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsgreng ba bsgrub par bya ba'i myu gu'o //
translated: Then, the karma-mudras: the vajra-ratna is extended, the mudra of the wish-granting gem.

original: kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam por kha phye bas mchog gi dar dbyangs 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam por kha phye bas mchog gi dar dbyangs 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The mouth is closed, and the ring finger and little finger are even and open: this is the mudra of holding the supreme banner.

original: dbus ma'i nor bu'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i nor bu'o //
translated: The middle finger is the jewel.

original: mthe'u chung gi rtse mo'o //
analyzed: mthe'u chung gi rtse mo'o //
translated: The tip of the little finger is the jewel.

original: 'og @171a *// du gtor ba'o //
analyzed: 'og @171a *// du gtor ba'o //
translated: Scattering below is the mudra of scattering.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o //
translated: From the vajra-binding, the finger-tips are extended as the jewel rosary.

original: rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang / logs gnyis su bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang / logs gnyis su bcing bar bya'o //
translated: The three vajra-ratnas are bound in front and on the two sides.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya'o //
translated: Placing the vajra jewel in the direction of the hair coil, one should make a knot with the tip of the index finger in the manner of a hanging banner.

original: mthe bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go /
translated: Having made a firm cross-legged position with the two thumbs, one should bend the two index fingers and make the supreme opening of the mouth, the supreme body of all tathāgatas.

original: des spyi bo nas brtsams te mdun dang / g-yas dang / rgyab dang / g-yon du bya ba byas nas de bzhin du mdun dang / rgyab dang / logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang / bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba byas nas /
analyzed: des spyi bo nas brtsams te mdun dang / g-yas dang / rgyab dang / g-yon du bya ba byas nas de bzhin du mdun dang / rgyab dang / logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang / bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba byas nas /
translated: Beginning from the crown, one should perform the actions in front, to the right, behind, and to the left, and likewise in front, behind, and on the two sides, with flirtations and embraces, one should perform the releasing of the ends, and so forth.

original: phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud ba bya zhing dar dpyangs kyis tshul du bya ste /
analyzed: phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud ba bya zhing dar dpyangs kyis tshul du bya ste /
translated: One should make a knot of the rosary, and make it in the manner of a hanging banner.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no //
translated: One will obtain the empowerment of Vajrasattva and the supreme of all lords of the three existences, the state of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lta ba bzhin no //
translated: All the vajra thoughts are as above.

original: de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: Now, this is the knowledge of the outer seal:

original: phyag rgya chen po ni g-yon par kham phor dang g-yas su mda' gtod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni g-yon par kham phor dang g-yas su mda' gtod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The great seal is the seal of the left hand holding a bowl and the right hand holding an arrow.

original: dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag mnyam por legs par sbyar @171b la rtse gsum par byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag mnyam por legs par sbyar @171b la rtse gsum par byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o //
translated: The engagement of the pledge is the index, middle, and ring fingers well joined and made into a three-pointed vajra, with the thumb and little finger in a chain.

original: ci nas ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ci nas ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of the goddesses is as it is held.

original: dam tshig ni gung me dang srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / mthe'u chung dang / srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni gung me dang srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / mthe'u chung dang / srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The pledge is the middle and ring fingers in a vajra fist, with the index, middle, and little fingers and the ring finger drawn to the base of the thumb.

original: gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur te dngos grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur te dngos grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin no //
translated: If one is unable to examine the maṇḍala, then by binding this, the maṇḍala is well examined, and one’s spiritual powers are also well offered.

original: lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang 'jug par bya'o ////
analyzed: lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang 'jug par bya'o ////
translated: The goddesses are summoned and admitted with this very [mudra].

original: de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g-yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang /
analyzed: de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g-yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang /
translated: Next, the illusion maṇḍala is as follows: Having extended all the fingers above the left [hand],

original: dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: it is the pledge maṇḍala wheel.

original: lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams cad don yod par bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams cad don yod par bsgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the accomplishment of the illusions of all demigods.

original: gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bong gnyis pas rtse mo phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i sor mo brgyad kyis gdengs ka'i tshogs kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o //
analyzed: gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bong gnyis pas rtse mo phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i sor mo brgyad kyis gdengs ka'i tshogs kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o //
translated: The king of the nāgas has two thumbs and eight fingers facing outward, with the tips of the fingers in the form of a hood. It is the pledge to summon, induct, bind, and control all nāgas. It is the great serpent’s hand.

original: gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one transgresses, one will die.

original: gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sgreng ste bsdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mos brdegs par byas na dug thams @172a *//
analyzed: gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sgreng ste bsdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mos brdegs par byas na dug thams @172a *//
translated: The four fingers, the thumb and the ring finger, should be crossed, and the two tips of the ring fingers should be struck with the gesture of delight, raised upward, gathered, and struck.

original: cad 'bar ba dang / dug thams cad bcing ba dang / kun nas bsdus te brdegs pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: cad 'bar ba dang / dug thams cad bcing ba dang / kun nas bsdus te brdegs pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o //
translated: All poisons are burned, all poisons are bound, and all poisons are destroyed by the gathering and striking.

original: 'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang / 'phro ba dug med par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang / 'phro ba dug med par bya'o //
translated: With this very [mudra], all poisons should be eaten and all poisons should be rendered harmless.

original: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
analyzed: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
translated: This is the extensive tantra of the external mudra ritual.

original: de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the extensive tantra of the ritual of the mudra that accomplishes all contemplations should be explained.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
translated: Thus spoke the Blessed One, the great secret vajra of great bliss, Vajrasattva.

original: de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
analyzed: de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
translated: Among them, the five body mudras are as follows:

original: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs la'o //
translated: The great mudra belongs to the family of Great Vajradhara.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
translated: The pledge seal is for the Tathagata lineage.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
translated: The vajra humkara is for the vajra lineage.

original: padma chen po ni padma'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: padma chen po ni padma'i rigs la'o //
translated: The great lotus is for the lotus lineage.

original: rdo rje nor bu chen po ni nor bu'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu chen po ni nor bu'i rigs la'o //
translated: The great vajra gem is for the gem lineage.

original: de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni /
analyzed: de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni /
translated: Next, the five speech seals:

original: snyan pa'i glu'i yul thams cad kyi tshul rnams nus pa ci lta bu'i glu'i rgyun thams cad kyis glu blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go /
analyzed: snyan pa'i glu'i yul thams cad kyi tshul rnams nus pa ci lta bu'i glu'i rgyun thams cad kyis glu blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go /
translated: All the ways of singing songs with all the melodies of songs, singing and reciting, is the vajra speech of the extremely joyful vajra for the Vajrasattva lineage.

original: lce dang / mchu gnyis shin tu g-yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i ngag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste /
analyzed: lce dang / mchu gnyis shin tu g-yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i ngag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste /
translated: The vajra speech free from melody, with the tongue and lips not moving at all and not touching each other, is for the Tathagata lineage.

original: rigs thams cad dgos pa'o //
analyzed: rigs thams cad dgos pa'o //
translated: It is necessary for all lineages.

original: sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge h'um gi sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo @172b rje'i rigs so //
analyzed: sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge h'um gi sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo @172b rje'i rigs so //
translated: The vajra family of speech is the vajra of the wrathful vajra, which is the subtle sound of the syllable hūṃ endowed with the sound of the thunder of clouds.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag padma'i rigs la te thams cad dag pa'i padma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag padma'i rigs la te thams cad dag pa'i padma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The lotus family of speech is the samādhi speech, called “the pure lotus.”

original: chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la te mchod pa'i nor bu'o //
analyzed: chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la te mchod pa'i nor bu'o //
translated: The jewel family of speech is the Dharma speech, the jewel of offering.

original: de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste /
analyzed: de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste /
translated: Next, the five mind seals.

original: thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so //
analyzed: thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so //
translated: For the accomplishment of all, with the entity of Vajrasattva.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
translated: For the tathāgata family, with the recollection of the Buddha.

original: bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
translated: “I should kill him, or in front of me,” is for the vajra family.

original: sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs la'o //
translated: “I should purify,” is for the lotus family.

original: nam mkha' thams cad bsgoms pas nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad bsgoms pas nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
translated: “I should meditate on all space,” is for the jewel family.

original: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
translated: Next, the five vajra seals.

original: rdo rje rtse mo lnga 'od zer gyi phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo lnga 'od zer gyi phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o //
translated: The five-pronged vajra, completely covered with a garland of light rays, is for the Vajra family.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
translated: The five-pronged vajra with light rays, with the mudra of the Tathāgata, is for the Tathāgata family.

original: 'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
translated: The four-pronged vajra with a blazing nature, with the mudra of the Vajra Wrathful One, is for the Vajra family.

original: padma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i padma'i khu tshur gyis padma'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: padma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i padma'i khu tshur gyis padma'i rigs la'o //
translated: The Tathāgata’s vajra on a lotus, with the mudra of the Lotus, is for the Lotus family.

original: rdo rje phyed pa rdo rje rin po che nor bu'i khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
analyzed: rdo rje phyed pa rdo rje rin po che nor bu'i khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
translated: The half-vajra, with the mudra of the jewel of the vajra, is for the Jewel family.

original: de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bden pa myur du mchog @173a *//
analyzed: de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bden pa myur du mchog @173a *//
translated: Then, for the realization of all families, the secret, unobstructed and infallible truth of reality, quickly supreme

original: gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med par myur ba'i mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
analyzed: gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med par myur ba'i mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One, Amogha, Unimpeded, Supremely Swift, the One with Attainments, Vajrasattva, said, I will explain the tantra of all the extensive rituals for attaining the attainments.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go /
translated: The great seal of Vajrasattva is the great bliss, the secret commitment of the vajra.

original: gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o //
analyzed: gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o //
translated: The speech seal is the essence mantra.

original: thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The mind seal is the near essence mantra.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma'i 'o ////
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma'i 'o ////
translated: The vajra seal is the seal of Vajragarvi.

original: de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te /
translated: Then, this is the tantra of the unimpeded, unfailing subtle karma seal:

original: ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o //
translated: By looking with the vajra gaze, while holding the lower lip with the teeth, one experiences the attainments of passion, control, play, and stability, in each moment, in the Vajrasattva lineage.

original: rdo rje phra mos byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: rdo rje phra mos byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: By blessing with the subtle vajra,

original: dam tshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'o //
translated: one sees the mere pledge, and attains the attainments of the dharani, the dhhyāna, the wisdom, the liberation, and the vision of the wisdom of liberation, of all the Ones-Gone-Thus, in the lineage of the Ones-Gone-Thus.

analyzed: phyogs thams @179b cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni /
translated: Binding all directions, intermediate directions, and the maṇḍala is

analyzed: 'thab mo srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas so //

translated: The weakening, rising, falling, and killing of the armies of others is by the vajra lightning of great bliss.🔽The pacification of all diseases such as all fevers and great diseases is by the vajra snatcher of great bliss.

analyzed: gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i 'byung po bskrad pas so //

translated: and the seeing of all the desired entities of the mind in all the space, and the appropriation of that, are by the Great Bliss Vajradhātvīśvarī.

translated: “All destruction, paralysis, splitting, stupefaction, sleep, sealing, falling, confusion, killing, and reversal are accomplished by the great-bliss-vajra-fierce mudrā.

translated: “All attraction, summoning, penetrating, causing emission, binding, releasing, splitting, causing to fall, causing to rise from falling, leading, making into a servant,

analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad @181a *//

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o //

original: 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o //

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya /

analyzed: rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdong pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o //

analyzed: bdag nyid la kun tu bskor nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //

analyzed: gtsug tor dang / phyogs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o //
translated: The crown protuberance, all directions, and the maṇḍala are circumambulated.
