analyzed: snying ga dang / yid kyis rgyab dang / phrag pa dang / spyi bo dang / dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la go cha bya ste /
translated: Having placed it on the heart, the mind, the back, the shoulders, the head, and the forehead, one should bind the rosary with the two vajra fists and make the armor.

original: mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dpyangs bya'o //
analyzed: mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dpyangs bya'o //
translated: Having made a knot, one should again make a rosary with the vajra places, make a knot on the back, and make a hanging silk.

original: snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bor gzhag @181b par bya'o //
analyzed: snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bor gzhag @181b par bya'o //
translated: One should place it on the heart, the forehead, the throat, and the head.

original: dbus ma'i dar mchog go /
analyzed: dbus ma'i dar mchog go /
translated: The middle one is the excellent silk.

original: byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang / 'jigs pa'i gdong gis blta ba'o //
analyzed: byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang / 'jigs pa'i gdong gis blta ba'o //
translated: The sweeping is the upward-facing breath and the fearful face.

original: 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'i rang gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'i rang gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o //
translated: One should steal the peak with the peaceful view, binding it at one’s heart with the method of the four blazing fires.

original: lta bas 'phrog par bya'o //
analyzed: lta bas 'phrog par bya'o //
translated: One should steal the view.

original: dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: One should quickly release by means of the descent.🔽Having completely encircled it, one should place it on the forehead.

original: yongs su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar bzhag ste /
analyzed: yongs su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar bzhag ste /
translated: The activity of the central vajra is as follows:

original: dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The activity of the central vajra is as follows:🔽placing it on the heart,🔽generating, binding, causing to dance,🔽clarifying the throat, pressing the tip of the vajra,🔽closing the mouth,🔽clarifying the throat,

original: snying gar gtod pa dang / skyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / gar byed du bcug pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / rdo rje rtse mo btsir ba dang / kha dbub pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / bcings pa myur du dkrol ba dang /
analyzed: snying gar gtod pa dang / skyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / gar byed du bcug pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / rdo rje rtse mo btsir ba dang / kha dbub pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / bcings pa myur du dkrol ba dang /
translated: quickly releasing the binding,

original: bsrung ba dang / bya ba pa'i las so //
analyzed: bsrung ba dang / bya ba pa'i las so //
translated: protecting, and the activity of the seal.

original: snying ga kha sbyor bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: snying ga kha sbyor bskyed pa'o //
translated: The generation of the heart union.

original: nyid re bzhin snga rol tu lan gcig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsal ba'i ngag dang / snying gar gzhag pa dang / phyag rgya la lta ba ste /
analyzed: nyid re bzhin snga rol tu lan gcig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsal ba'i ngag dang / snying gar gzhag pa dang / phyag rgya la lta ba ste /
translated: One should do the purification of the body, the purification of the speech, the placement at the heart, and the looking at the consort, each day before dawn.

original: nyin re snga rol du lan gcig dbang po thams cad la kun tu bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyin re snga rol du lan gcig dbang po thams cad la kun tu bskor bar bya'o //
translated: One should do the complete circling of all the organs each day before dawn.

original: dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas so //
analyzed: dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas so //
translated: The activity of the central vajra is done with the wrathful vajra gaze.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung ste /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung ste /
translated: The activity of the central vajra is as follows.

original: nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang / dbab pa sbyin pa dang / 'bar ba'i me stag byed @182a *//
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang / dbab pa sbyin pa dang / 'bar ba'i me stag byed @182a *//
translated: The enjoyment, the summoning of all, the giving of the descent, the blazing sparks,

original: pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung gi tshul dang / nam mkhar sgom pa las du ma'o //
analyzed: pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung gi tshul dang / nam mkhar sgom pa las du ma'o //
translated: the appropriation, the mode of the wind, and the meditation in space are the many.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang / rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang / sen mo brud pa dang / mig 'degs pa dang / btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying gar bteg pa dang / ltung ba dang /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang / rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang / sen mo brud pa dang / mig 'degs pa dang / btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying gar bteg pa dang / ltung ba dang /
translated: to raise the eyes,🔽to close the eyes,🔽to raise the heart with the fingers together,🔽to fall down,🔽to rise up,🔽to strike each other,

original: slong bar byed pa dang / phan tshun rdeg pa dang / rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so //
analyzed: slong bar byed pa dang / phan tshun rdeg pa dang / rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so //
translated: and to place it naturally at the heart.🔽The actions of the central vajra are:🔽to shoot an arrow,🔽to summon with two hooks,🔽to insert the right into the left,

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' gtod pa dang / lcags sgrog gnyis kyis dgug pa dang / g-yon pa la g-yas pa bcug pa dang / rtse mo bskyod pa dang / gdu bur bcing ba dang / myur du dgrol ba dang / sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba dang /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' gtod pa dang / lcags sgrog gnyis kyis dgug pa dang / g-yon pa la g-yas pa bcug pa dang / rtse mo bskyod pa dang / gdu bur bcing ba dang / myur du dgrol ba dang / sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba dang /
translated: to move the tips,🔽to bind with a bracelet,🔽to quickly untie,🔽to quickly separate the fingers,🔽and to quickly join them.

original: ltung bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bteg pa dang / g-yon pa g-yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang / tshur 'dren pa dang / phar gtang ba dang /
analyzed: ltung bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bteg pa dang / g-yon pa g-yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang / tshur 'dren pa dang / phar gtang ba dang /
translated: the violent drawing with the left and right mudra,🔽the drawing of the tip to one’s heart mudra,🔽the application to all activities mudra,🔽the insertion of the wheel into the heart mudra,

original: g-yon dang / g-yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang / rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i las dang / snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
analyzed: g-yon dang / g-yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang / rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i las dang / snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
translated: the consecration garland mudra,🔽the binding of the hanging silk mudra,🔽the drawing from the heart and drawing in of all bliss mudra,

original: dar dpyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang / snying gar @182b de las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang / gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so //
analyzed: dar dpyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang / snying gar @182b de las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang / gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so //
translated: and the dance-drawn mudra of releasing at the crown.🔽The great bliss is fully accomplished,

original: bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
translated: and the great passion is purified.🔽The all-accomplishing, unobstructed,

original: don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: and various activities🔽are accomplished by the mudras.

original: phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad //
translated: The Tantra of the Seal is fully explained.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis //
translated: The Great Vajra Holder

original: sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun //
translated: All the nature of the Buddhas and their sons🔽Grant the swift accomplishment of all sentient beings,

original: sems can thams cad myur grub dang // don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad myur grub dang // don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o //
translated: And all the accomplishments of the inexhaustible.

original: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa //
translated: Those who have not entered the maṇḍala,

original: sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan //
analyzed: sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with all sinful actions,

original: de dag kyang ni grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: de dag kyang ni grub 'gyur te //
translated: They too will be accomplished,

original: bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir //🔽gang zhig le lo nyid kyis sam //
analyzed: bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir // gang zhig le lo nyid kyis sam //
translated: Because merely by binding, their sins are purified.🔽Those who are lazy,

original: brtson 'grus ldan yang ma tshad ba //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ldan yang ma tshad ba //
translated: Or those who are diligent but incomplete,

original: dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang //
translated: Those sentient beings without a maṇḍala,🔽The consecration of the master himself,

original: slob dpon nyid byin ma rlabs dang // de dag grub mchog rdo rje chen //
analyzed: slob dpon nyid byin ma rlabs dang // de dag grub mchog rdo rje chen //
translated: And those with the supreme accomplishment of the great vajra,

original: rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Become the vajra master themselves.

original: don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: The supreme and various inexhaustible

original: bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed //🔽bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i //
analyzed: bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed // bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i //
translated: Are accomplished swiftly by merely binding.🔽Fulfilling all wishes,

original: mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug /
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug /
translated: Engaging in all the supreme accomplishments,

original: dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog /
analyzed: dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog /
translated: The supreme vajra of the elements

original: bde ba che las yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: bde ba che las yang dag 'byung //
translated: arises from the utterly pure great bliss.🔽It is the accomplishment of the latent tendencies,

original: bag chag shin tu grub pa dang // dgrol ba thams cad la yang ngo //
analyzed: bag chag shin tu grub pa dang // dgrol ba thams cad la yang ngo //
translated: and also of all the liberations.

original: de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni //
translated: Then, the secret tantra of the accomplishment of all seals:

original: las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni //
translated: The seal at the beginning of the desired action

original: skal ba ci bzhin snying pos grub //🔽rang gi bdag nyid @183a *//
analyzed: skal ba ci bzhin snying pos grub // rang gi bdag nyid @183a *//
translated: is accomplished by the essence according to fortune.🔽One should apply oneself

original: nges sbyar bya //
analyzed: nges sbyar bya //
translated: to one's own nature.

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
translated: From the Great King of Secret Tantras of the Vajra of Great Bliss,

original: bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o ////
analyzed: bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o ////
translated: the great bliss of all, the supreme siddhi of the vajra commitment Amogha, the extensive and complete ritual of the later tantra is completed.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyis sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyis sbyor ba ni /
translated: Then, the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata, the ultimate of all tathāgatas, the body, speech, and mind of all vajras, the union of all activities,

original: rdo rje 'chang ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang pa'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun du khyab cing spro ba dang / dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang pa'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun du khyab cing spro ba dang / dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa /
translated: It is the extensive ritual of all powers,🔽and the ultimate teaching of the ultimate end of all existence.

original: srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i yongs su mthar thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i yongs su mthar thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: It is the supplication to Vajrasattva, who is without beginning or end.

original: rdo rje nam mkha' chen po yis //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' chen po yis //
translated: The great vajra space

original: chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mchog /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mchog /
translated: is the supreme expansion of the dharmadhatu.

original: rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi //
analyzed: rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi //
translated: The great vajra space

original: chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ster //
analyzed: chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ster //
translated: bestows the power of expanding the dharmadhatu.

original: rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
analyzed: rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
translated: Always, all buddhas

original: rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni //
translated: together with the great vajra holders

original: yongs su mthar thug nus pa min //
analyzed: yongs su mthar thug nus pa min //
translated: are unable to fully reach the end🔽of the vehicle of the vajra holders.

original: ae ma'o mngon zhes sems can dang // le lo can dang @183b las kun dang // thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod //
analyzed: ae ma'o mngon zhes sems can dang // le lo can dang @183b las kun dang // thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod //
translated: and you, O Vajra of sublime compassion,

original: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
translated: are the unsurpassed enlightenment mind.🔽In order to accomplish great bliss

original: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
translated: and purify great desire,

original: rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa //
analyzed: rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa //
translated: this imagination is the ultimate.

original: rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod //
analyzed: rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod //
translated: In order to accomplish it, it is called the ultimate.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One, having heard the request of all the tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so //
translated: entered the samādhi called The Blessing of Vajrasattva, the Samādhi of All Tathāgatas, and spoke this:🔽In order to accomplish great bliss

original: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
translated: and purify great desire,

original: thams cad dngos grub don du ni //
analyzed: thams cad dngos grub don du ni //
translated: for the sake of the attainment of all,

original: yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o //
translated: it is the ultimate blessing.

original: gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang // gang gis khyim na gsang ba thams cad gnas //
analyzed: gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang // gang gis khyim na gsang ba thams cad gnas //
translated: and whoever keeps all the secrets in the home,

original: bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'i //
analyzed: bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'i //
translated: the supreme secret of the supreme vajra of great bliss,

original: dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la bstan //
analyzed: dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la bstan //
translated: will attain spiritual powers in this life.

original: brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed //
analyzed: brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed //
translated: I do not create obstacles because of stability.

original: sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir //
analyzed: sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, I purify the karma of the victors.

original: rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te //
analyzed: rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te //
translated: This is the purification.

original: rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med //
analyzed: rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med //
translated: In this tantra, there are no obstacles, no māras,

original: dngos grub 'phel med min par byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: dngos grub 'phel med min par byin gyis brlabs //
translated: and no blessing of nonincrease of spiritual powers.

original: bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed //
analyzed: bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed //
translated: I do not create māras and instability.

original: brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed //
analyzed: brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed //
translated: I do not create obstacles because of stability.

original: rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang bsgrub pa //🔽myur du dngos @184a *//
analyzed: rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang bsgrub pa // myur du dngos @184a *//
translated: Whoever accomplishes this supreme great tantra🔽will quickly attain the supreme spiritual powers.

original: grub mchog phyir bdag brtan 'gyur //
analyzed: grub mchog phyir bdag brtan 'gyur //
translated: I am stable.

original: brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rjes su cha chags //
analyzed: brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rjes su cha chags //
translated: Stable and very pleased, I am stable and attached.

original: bde ba chen po kun byed shin tu rgyas //
analyzed: bde ba chen po kun byed shin tu rgyas //
translated: I am the great bliss that performs everything and is very vast.

original: nga yi dang po'i snying po gang sgrub pa //
analyzed: nga yi dang po'i snying po gang sgrub pa //
translated: I always bestow spiritual powers

original: de la nga ni rtag tu dngos grub ste //
analyzed: de la nga ni rtag tu dngos grub ste //

analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
translated: Then all the tathagatas gathered and bestowed the exclamation of “Excellent!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
translated: They praised what the bhagavat had said.

analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa'i rgud phyi ma yongs su rdzogs so ////
